content: this gorgeous lacy slouch hat pairs modern trends with true comfort in fact my beautiful friend who modeled the hat for me kept saying how easy it was to forget she was even wearing it made with dk 3 weight yarn it s a lightweight and stylish accessory perfect for early fall through late spring sizes included toddler 1-3 years child 3-10 years teen adult ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ this beautiful hat is part of the wisteria collection pair it with the matching wisteria cardigan pattern available 4/10 for an absolutely stunning combination you ll find the wisteria cardigan pattern by clicking here 2 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ this is a beginner-intermediate level pattern which is worked in the round from the top down this pattern calls for dk 3 weight yarn and size 5 0mm h crochet hook or whatever size is needed to achieve gauge i am always available to answer any questions you may have you can contact me at melody@melodys-makings com ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ you have permission to sell the finished product - please leave a link to my website in your product listing ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ this design a written work and images are a copyright of ©melodysmakings and may not be copied or reproduced in any way ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ sign up for the melody s makings newsletter and get 2 free patterns right away you ll get regular freebies fun and exclusive content 1 http //melodys-makings com/wisteria-slouch-hat-friday-freebie/ 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wisteria-mystery-create-a-long--crochet-version
